creator: Webelinx Games
descriptionHtml:
NEW and CHALLENGING room escape game is OUT NOW!
You must unlock the door!

Welcome to the world of unique game! Don't miss the opportunity to explore exciting escape room scenes for unexpected keys in the new Webelinx ETR games 🔐. Your task is to thoroughly inspect the rooms for the clues, constantly observe, connect all the hints together and find the keys!

Get ready for the thrilling „Rooms & Exits: Escape the Room games for free“🔑

Awesome features:
🔑 New escape games for free
🔒 Multiple entertaining levels
🔑 Challenging logic puzzles and brain teasers
🔒 Fun warm-up levels for an easy start
🔑 User-friendly hints for the successful exit
🔒New rooms added regularly
🔑 Inspect the various rooms with awesome puzzles
🔒 Cool graphics and animations

If you thrive on a challenge, you'll enjoy the varieties of rooms and the satisfaction of conquering each level. On the one side, it is a classic game with a user-friendly gameplay, on the other side, it is a brand-new and unique logic game with lots of logic puzzles and brain games, rooms and doors, locks and codes, which will entertain you for hours 🚪!

🔐 Prepare yourself for the thrilling room escape with the challenging levels!

Accept the challenge - search the rooms for hidden items, find clues, use the logic and solve the puzzles, find the keys and open the room. A new logic game will help you to grow up sharpness and memory power. Use your collected items to exit the room. Click on hints if you stuck at some point in the room escape challenge.

🔐 Download Rooms & Exits: Escape the Room games for free and enjoy fun and interesting levels!

The point of the open the door games is to have fun and exit the room you are locked into. Of course the most important is to find the exit and the key to open doors! Play new adult games for free and make a contest with your friends. If you are a real fan of the puzzle-solving challenges, this fun challenging game is the real jewel for you!

✂ Use your survival skills to break the codes in the „Rooms & Exits: Can you escape and pass all the levels?

Room escape games are the best adventure games where the player must open the door by solving a wide range of puzzles and by using hidden items in the scenes. You must run – you’ve heard it a thousand times, seems like an easy task, but you could gain a real exciting experience once you play „Rooms & Exits: Escape the Room games for free 2020"🚪!

title: Rooms & Exits - Escape games

creator: Webelinx Games
descriptionHtml:
Can you help Fiona find a way out of the escape room and open 100 doors before it's too late?

What you have in front of you is an escape room game like no other. Solve escape room puzzles, and save mankind!

In multiple escape rooms, you must find hidden objects, codes, and clues and discover how to open 100 doors before you can call yourself a true mystery escape games artist. Don't worry, practice makes perfect and your problem-solving skills will improve the more escape rooms you break out of.

"Rooms & Exits: Mystery Escape Games 2022" is the ultimate brain test with over 100 doors to open. So, accept the challenge and escape the room with your brain and mind power as your only tools!

Captivating adventure escape games with unique mind puzzles and challenging 100 doors

A thrilling escape adventure is waiting for you - you must do some serious detective work to investigate scenes, open 100 doors, and escape rooms!
You will find yourself in a multiverse of stories: from a warehouse to a bookstore, a jewelry store, and a fashion boutique - our "escape room games" will take you everywhere!

**Rooms & Exits: Mystery Escape Games** is more than a regular adventure escape room game. It is:

* Escape rooms with a mystery story and a gripping storyline;
* Multiple adventure escape games with over 100 doors to open;
* A mind game with an abundance of logic puzzles, hidden objects, and brain teasers;
* A detective game with hints, not instructions: you do all the logical thinking;
* The most amusing prison escape brain challenge you can find.

Can you escape 100 doors? Adventure escape games for all aspiring prison escape room artists.

Your task is to help Fiona escape the prison of 100 doors. She is a young and brave journalist turned detective, and she must expose the evil masterplan of a mysterious villain. Follow the thrilling prison escape detective story as you solve brain puzzles and travel from one prison escape room to the next, hoping to catch up with Fiona's jailer and stop him from destroying the entire world!

Solve the criminal case of the century and escape the prison of the conspiracy bringing it to the light

In our adventure escape games with story, you will find solutions to all types of logic puzzles and brain teasers only by thinking outside the box. Can you outsmart the infamous boss who trapped you in this seemingly endless labyrinth of prison escape rooms and 100 doors? Challenge your mind with tricky logic puzzles, escape the prison and open 100 doors on your way to freedom in thrilling detective games.

No time to waste, detective, you have to escape the prison. There's a serious unsolved criminal case on your hands, so you better begin the investigation immediately. Download Rooms and Exits - Adventure Escape Games; Fiona needs your help to escape the prison!
descriptionShort: Follow a thrilling story & solve puzzles to unravel the escape room mystery.

title: Rooms & Exits - Escape games

creator: Webelinx Games
descriptionHtml:
Can you help Fiona find a way out of the escape room and open 100 doors before it's too late?

What you have in front of you is an escape room game like no other. Solve escape room puzzles, and save mankind!

In multiple escape rooms, you must find hidden objects, codes, and clues and discover how to open 100 doors before you can call yourself a true mystery escape games artist. Don't worry, practice makes perfect and your problem-solving skills will improve the more escape rooms you break out of.

"Rooms & Exits: Mystery Escape Games 2022" is the ultimate brain test with over 100 doors to open. So, accept the challenge and escape the room with your brain and mind power as your only tools!

Captivating adventure escape games with unique mind puzzles and challenging 100 doors

A thrilling escape adventure is waiting for you - you must do some serious detective work to investigate scenes, open 100 doors, and escape rooms!
You will find yourself in a multiverse of stories: from a warehouse to a bookstore, a jewelry store, and a fashion boutique - our "escape room games" will take you everywhere!

**Rooms & Exits: Mystery Escape Games** is more than a regular adventure escape room game. It is:

* Escape rooms with a mystery story and a gripping storyline;
* Multiple adventure escape games with over 100 doors to open;
* A mind game with an abundance of logic puzzles, hidden objects, and brain teasers;
* A detective game with hints, not instructions: you do all the logical thinking;
* The most amusing prison escape brain challenge you can find.

Can you escape 100 doors? Adventure escape games for all aspiring prison escape room artists.

Your task is to help Fiona escape the prison of 100 doors. She is a young and brave journalist turned detective, and she must expose the evil masterplan of a mysterious villain. Follow the thrilling prison escape detective story as you solve brain puzzles and travel from one prison escape room to the next, hoping to catch up with Fiona's jailer and stop him from destroying the entire world!

Solve the criminal case of the century and escape the prison of the conspiracy bringing it to the light

In our adventure escape games with story, you will find solutions to all types of logic puzzles and brain teasers only by thinking outside the box. Can you outsmart the infamous boss who trapped you in this seemingly endless labyrinth of prison escape rooms and 100 doors? Challenge your mind with tricky logic puzzles, escape the prison and open 100 doors on your way to freedom in thrilling detective games.

No time to waste, detective, you have to escape the prison. There's a serious unsolved criminal case on your hands, so you better begin the investigation immediately. Download Rooms and Exits - Adventure Escape Games; Fiona needs your help to escape the prison!
descriptionShort: Follow a thrilling story & solve puzzles to unravel the escape room mystery.

title: Rooms & Exits - Escape games

creator: Webelinx Games
descriptionHtml:
🔍 Unleash Your Inner Detective! Join Fiona on an Unforgettable Mystery Adventure! 🔍

Are you ready to dive headfirst into the captivating world of mysteries and puzzles? Step into the shoes of Fiona, the fearless journalist detective, and get ready to experience an escape room game like no other. Prepare yourself for an exhilarating adventure mystery filled with twists, turns, and mind-bending challenges that will put your detective skills to the ultimate test.

📰 Uncover Intriguing Cases 📰

Fiona, renowned for her keen eye and razor-sharp intellect, has stumbled upon a series of perplexing cases that have left even the most seasoned investigators scratching their heads. In this crime-solving adventure escape game, you'll find yourself immersed in a captivating storyline, where every clue brings you closer to unraveling the truth.

💡 Engage in Challenging Puzzles 💡

Get ready to exercise your grey matter, detective! Our escape room game is designed to challenge even the most astute minds. As you investigate crime scenes, search for hidden objects and clues, and crack cryptic codes, you'll unlock the secrets and mysteries that lie within. Each puzzle you solve will bring you closer to the heart-pounding climax of each case, where the truth awaits your discovery.

🕵️‍♀️ Embrace Your Inner Detective 🕵️‍♀️

Fiona's adventures will ignite your passion for mystery-solving as you uncover hidden clues and motives, untangle complex webs of deception, and expose the culprits behind each baffling crime. With Fiona as your guide, you'll become an integral part of the investigation, solving puzzles, uncovering mysteries, and finally finding the exit from an escape room. Can you unravel the mysteries and escape before it's too late?

🌟 Unforgettable Escape Room Experience 🌟

Our escape room game is tailor-made for curious minds who seek an exhilarating and immersive adventure mystery. Whether you're a seasoned puzzle enthusiast or a novice in the world of escape room mysteries, Fiona's escapades will captivate you from start to finish. And if you ever get stuck, the hint button is a lifesaver!

❓ Looking for a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat ❓

Look no further than Rooms & Exits, the ultimate mobile escape room experience. If you're a fan of adventure escape games, you'll love our mystery escape rooms. With a variety of levels and puzzles to solve, you'll never get bored.
So download and see if you have what it takes to beat the room!

creator: Webelinx Games
descriptionHtml:
🔍 Unleash Your Inner Detective! Join Fiona on an Unforgettable Mystery Adventure! 🔍

Are you ready to dive headfirst into the captivating world of mysteries and puzzles? Step into the shoes of Fiona, the fearless journalist detective, and get ready to experience an escape room game like no other. Prepare yourself for an exhilarating adventure mystery filled with twists, turns, and mind-bending challenges that will put your detective skills to the ultimate test.

📰 Uncover Intriguing Cases 📰

Fiona, renowned for her keen eye and razor-sharp intellect, has stumbled upon a series of perplexing cases that have left even the most seasoned investigators scratching their heads. In this crime-solving adventure escape game, you'll find yourself immersed in a captivating storyline, where every clue brings you closer to unraveling the truth.

💡 Engage in Challenging Puzzles 💡

Get ready to exercise your grey matter, detective! Our escape room game is designed to challenge even the most astute minds. As you investigate crime scenes, search for hidden objects and clues, and crack cryptic codes, you'll unlock the secrets and mysteries that lie within. Each puzzle you solve will bring you closer to the heart-pounding climax of each case, where the truth awaits your discovery.

🕵️‍♀️ Embrace Your Inner Detective 🕵️‍♀️

Fiona's adventures will ignite your passion for mystery-solving as you uncover hidden clues and motives, untangle complex webs of deception, and expose the culprits behind each baffling crime. With Fiona as your guide, you'll become an integral part of the investigation, solving puzzles, uncovering mysteries, and finally finding the exit from an escape room. Can you unravel the mysteries and escape before it's too late?

🌟 Unforgettable Escape Room Experience 🌟

Our escape room game is tailor-made for curious minds who seek an exhilarating and immersive adventure mystery. Whether you're a seasoned puzzle enthusiast or a novice in the world of escape room mysteries, Fiona's escapades will captivate you from start to finish. And if you ever get stuck, the hint button is a lifesaver!

❓ Looking for a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat ❓

Look no further than Rooms & Exits, the ultimate mobile escape room experience. If you're a fan of adventure escape games, you'll love our mystery escape rooms. With a variety of levels and puzzles to solve, you'll never get bored.
So download and see if you have what it takes to beat the room!
